snippet.title: Sulfur - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer - The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description:
Take on a variety of enemies, learn about your character, and get a look at brutal combat and gameplay as a member of the development team from Perfect Random gives you a tour of Sulfur, an upcoming game that combines first-person shooter mechanics with classic role-playing and roguelite elements.

In Sulfur, welcome to a modern old-school action-adventure: Outsmart enemies, find treasure, improve weapons, harness powers. Delve deeper, find answers, make it end.
